00341 #define eol_vec3d_into_array(ar,vec)   (ar[0] = vec.x,ar[1] = vec.y,ar[2] = vec.z)
00342 #define eol_vec2d_into_array(ar,vec)   (ar[0] = vec.x,ar[1] = vec.y)

00352 #define eol_vec3d_dot_product(a,b)      (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z)
00353 #define eol_vec2d_dot_product(a,b)      (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y)

00361 #define eol_vec3d_copy(dst,src)  (dst.x = src.x,dst.y = src.y,dst.z = src.z)

00372 #define eol_vector_sub_3D(a,b,c)     (c.x=a.x-b.x,c.y=a.y-b.y,c.z=a.z-b.z)
00373 #define eol_vector_sub_3D_p(a,b,c)     (c->x=a->x-b->x,c->y=a->y-b->y,c->z=a->z-b->z)
00374 #define eol_vector_sub_2D(a,b,c)     (c.x=a.x-b.x,c.y=a.y-b.y)
00375 #define eol_vector_sub_2D_p(a,b,c)     (c->x=a->x-b->x,c->y=a->y-b->y)

00386 #define eol_vector_add_3D(a,b,c)     (c.x=a.x+b.x,c.y=a.y+b.y,c.z=a.z+b.z)
00387 #define eol_vec3d_add(out,in1,in2)   (out.x = in1.x+in2.x,out.y = in1.y+in2.y,out.z = in1.z+in2.z)
00388 #define eol_vector_add_3D_p(a,b,c)     (c->x=a->x+b->x,c->y=a->y+b->y,c->z=a->z+b->z)
00389 #define eol_vector_add_2D(a,b,c)     (c.x=a.x+b.x,c.y=a.y+b.y)
00390 #define eol_vector_add_2D_p(a,b,c)     (c->x=a->x+b->x,c->y=a->y+b->y)
00391 
00401 #define eol_vector_scale_3D(a,b,c)  (c.x=a.x*b,c.y=a.y*b,c.z=a.z*b)
00402 #define eol_vector_scale_3D_p(a,b,c)  (c->x=a->x*b,c->y=a->y*b,c->z=a->z*b)
00403 #define eol_vector_scale_2D(a,b,c)  (c.x=a.x*b,c.y=a.y*b)
00404 #define eol_vector_scale_2D_p(a,b,c)  (c->x=a->x*b,c->y=a->y*b)
00405 
00413 #define eol_vector_clear_3D(a)       (a.x=a.y=a.z=0)
00414 #define eol_vector_clear_3D_p(a)       (a->x=a->y=a->z=0)
00415 #define eol_vector_clear_2D(a)       (a.x=a.y=0)
00416 #define eol_vector_clear_2D_p(a)       (a->x=a->y=0)

00426 #define eol_vector_negate_3D(a,b)      (b.x=-a.x,b.y=-a.y,b.z=-a.z)
00427 #define eol_vector_negate_3D_p(a,b)      (b->x=-a->x,b->y=-a->y,b->z=-a->z)
00428 #define eol_vector_negate_2D(a,b)      (b.x=-a.x,b.y=-a.y)
00429 #define eol_vector_negate_2D_p(a,b)      (b->x=-a->x,b->y=-a->y)

00442 #define eol_vec2d_set(v, a, b)  (v.x=(a), v.y=(b))
